definition: worthy of being depended on, as acknowledged, proper alignment, make level, square, balanced, or concentric
details:
adjective
- worthy of being depended on
= synonyms: reliable
- accurately placed or thrown
= example: accurately placed or thrown
= synonyms: dead on target
- accurately fitted
= synonyms: straight
- devoted (sometimes fanatically) to a cause or concept or truth
= example: devoted (sometimes fanatically) to a cause or concept or truth
- in tune
= synonyms: on-key
- expressing or given to expressing the truth
= example: expressing or given to expressing the truth
= synonyms: truthful
- consistent with fact or reality
- conforming to definitive criteria
= example: conforming to definitive criteria
- having a legally established claim
= synonyms: rightful
- determined with reference to the earth's axis rather than the magnetic poles
- rightly so called
- not pretended
= synonyms: genuine
adverb
- as acknowledged
= example: as acknowledged
= synonyms: admittedly, avowedly, confessedly
noun
- proper alignment
verb
- make level, square, balanced, or concentric
= example: make level, square, balanced, or concentric
= synonyms: true up
